description.en:
A collection of romance oneshots.  
  
Delicate ni Kiss Shite  
Sachi loves her older boyfriend a lot but after three months of going out she grows more and more insecure. They meet up and go on dates, and while she does enjoy his company, why is it that he always seems to keep his distance?  
  
I Want to Take You Away  
Home tutor Anzu doesn't have complete confidence in love and relationships. However, her student Kazuki is earnestly attracted to her. When her boyfriend starts to neglect her and she asks Kazuki to be his substitute for a date, what will happen between them…?  
  
Aquarius Lover  
"I've never believed that there were such things as love at first sight until that moment…"  
High-school student Kaori has fallen in love with the mysterious black-haired boy who rescued her during a school trip. She is overjoyed to spot him on their school ground but little does she know that there are two students with his face…  
  
Seesaw Game  
A poor college student is faced with a sharp-tongued high-school girl as he sweeps the floor in front of a cheesy movie poster. Despite their clashing personalities he soon finds himself sitting next to her watching said cheesy romance movie. What will happen to them next?
